title: Chirun Update
text:
What is Chirun?

Chirun is a tool that converts LaTeX to accessible web pages
Traditionally, lecture notes containing equations are created in LaTeX
To this day, standard LaTeX editor only output to PDF (a format designed for print)
PDFs are notoriously bad in terms of accessibility

What makes an equation accessible?
Accessible equations work for people and technologies, not just visually.

Perceivable ‚Äì not image-only

Operable ‚Äì navigable, not flattened

Understandable ‚Äì meaning, not just symbols

Robust ‚Äì works across tools


Based on WCAG POUR principles

title: Chirun Update
section: Is Chirun the only tool like this?
text:
Is Chirun the only tool like this?

No, some similar tools exist, but no leading platform
Some staff have developed their own custom solutions

Not essential you use Chirun
But should accessible and ideally web-based

Chirun has the benefit of integration with Blackboard
Plus local support available
